safetyTips: Home delivery orders and payment are taken over the phone. If you are self-isolating, then let us know. The shop and kitchen (where our heat-and-eat meals are prepared) both have the top hygiene rating of 5 and we are taking all recommended additional precautions.

safetyTips: Contactless delivery and social distancing in restaurant for take aways
name: TRATTORIA ROMANA
address: 32 Bank Street Ashford Kent TN23 1BA

name: BETSY & BLUE BOUTIQUE
address: Mitchell's House, Kingsford Street, Mersham, Ashford, Kent, TN25 6PE
description: Hi, we're Betsy & Blue Boutique; an online retail store specialising in gorgeous Gifts, Homeware, Accessories and Body & Bath products. There is no minimum spend, and we offer a delivery by Royal Mail with a shipping cost option, or a free Local Collection option whereby locals can collect their goods for free from our TN25 address. We can also hand deliver to the TN24 & TN25 areas if you are in a hurry for your items. We offer a free gift wrapping service too, so we can post gifts to your loved ones for special occasions.

safetyTips: Extra Cleaning procedures in place. Non contact doorstep Delivery.

description: I handmake bespoke pieces of jewellery from my workshop in Ashford. I can help you design a piece of jewellery that is part of a love story, family history or friendship. I make engagement rings, cocktail rings, weddings rings, earrings, necklaces and other bespoke pieces. Order via email, phone, facebook, instagram.

safetyTips: Post using Royal Mail or distanced collections from in store.

address: Made in Ashford, Unit 26, Park Mall, Ashford, TN24 8NY
description: Made in Ashford is a collaborative of local designer/makers and crafts people selling and supporting each other.  We are run by Craftship Enterprise CIC, a social enterprise aiming to help creativity to be accessible to everyone in the community and support small, local, creative businesses. We sell the products of our members through our bricks and mortar shop and website. Craftship Enterprise shares free online workshops and creative activities to anyone in the world. These are paid for through commission generated on sales in the shop and online. Order Online. Collection or Postal Delivery.

Free deliveries within a five mile radius. Over five miles charged.

All our food is freshly prepared and sourced with in a 25 mile radius supporting local business .  *Our days for suppers will change in line with the demand and will be reviewed weekly .
